title: #2 Are Cops Racist? Do Chokeholds Kill?
description: SUBSCRIBE ON ITUNES This week we’re joined by the fantastic John Hawkins of RightWingNews.com, and the lovely Kate Bryan of Acculterated and LiveActionFilms. We were also joined by Rener Gracie, but the audio was corrupted, so we’ll get him back this month. We discuss the increasingly destructive Ferguson riots, racist cops, Chris Rock’s recent, racist statements and exactly what happened in the famous New York chokehold case.  Also, FunDip discusses his trips to the grocery store.  Hold onto your butts!
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
